close_dialog_message: Are you sure you want to exit the application?

0.name: Exit Door (Closed)
descriptions: You shall not pass!

text: You placed the bucket on the floor next to the door.
[you dumped out the sick from the bucket... hopefully there was nobody standing underneath...]

4.name: Bed
descriptions: There's no going back.
Don't be such a lazy shit.

8.name: Wall Socket (Nothing Plugged In)
descriptions: What did you think that was gonna do?
Don't stick your finger in there!

text: .... BOOOOOOM!!!!

9.name: Wall Socket (Bucket Plugged In)
descriptions: That's a-doorable!
When one door closes, that one opens.
You seem a little unhinged.
You knock knock knocked that out of the park.
Just go through the door, idiot.

text: Alcohol is the key to happiness. Not this door.
That's a waste of good booze.
Nuthing happened.
That's nut going to help.
Don't put your nuts all over the door.
That's a waste of good nuts.
[...the parrot seems willing to talk...]
I lava the way you're thinking. But you're wrong.
I lava the way you're thinking. But you're wrong.
Something's already plugged in, genius.
